title: Brown Bear, Brown Bear, What Do You See?
author: Bill Martin Jr.
description: A big happy frog, a plump purple cat, a handsome blue horse, and a soft yellow duck--all parade across the pages of this delightful book.

title: Silly Sea Creatures
author: Little Hippo Books
description: Join a few favorite under the sea creatures, like a singing starfish or an organized octopus, in this fun to read silicone touch and feel children's book.
